conclusion: To find the magnitude of the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground, consider the forces acting on the sled and the child.
The weight of the child is calculated as 300 N.
The weight of the sled is calculated as 100 N.
The pulling force is 100 N at an angle of 37 degrees.
The horizontal component of the pulling force is calculated as 80 N.
The vertical component of the pulling force is calculated as 60 N.
The normal force is the force exerted by the ground on the sled, balancing the vertical forces.
The normal force is calculated as 340 N.
The pressure exerted by the sled on the ground is equal to the normal force.
The magnitude of the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground is 340 N.
